thread.section_title: HelloFresh US Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of HelloFresh US | hellofresh.com | 18 of 288
thread.title: Kristin

author: Kristin
title: Kristin
text: We have been customers of hello fresh for 8 weeks. We started at 3 meals a week, but quickly increased it to 5. Meals come beautifully prepackaged, and ice packs over the meat stay frozen for days. We love the variety of meals. I have yet to see a repeat. After reviewing many meal delivery services we felt this one was the best since we are a "meat and potato" family. There is a meat, carb and veggie with every meal. I love that I don't have to stress about what to make for dinner and cuts down on grocery shopping. It has also exposed us to different ingredients we normally wouldn't have used!
